1) Official Driver Magician latest version is 3.62 or very close... Why is this version 3.94 ???

2) What does it mean "lite"  for you? I see according to your description the same features as in the official version.
lite means the colour lite blue

hahah...  "lite blue" ...

No offence, but these crazy-versions are so suspictious of being garbage.
